7 geometry_msgs::Pose HandPoseGenerator::placeHand ( desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle geometry, int whichArm )
8 {
9 
10  Eigen::Matrix4d M_desired_local; /*in cyl frame*/
11  Eigen::Vector4d Point_desired, Pos_ori_hand; /*in cyl frame*/
12  Eigen::Vector4d translation; /*in cyl frame*/
13  Eigen::Vector3d x(1,0,0);
14  Eigen::Vector3d y(0,1,0), z(0,0,1);
15  Eigen::Matrix4d T_K_H;
16  tf::StampedTransform T_K_vito_ancor;
17  Eigen::Vector4d local;
18  Eigen::Matrix4d T_w_h, T_vito_c;
19  double max_radius = 0.1;
20 
21  Eigen::Affine3d mtemp;
22 
23  T_vito_c = FromMsgtoEigen( geometry.pose );
24 
25  Eigen::Matrix4d Rot_z;
26  Rot_z.row(0)<< -1,0,0,0;
27  Rot_z.row(1)<< 0,-1,0,0;
28  Rot_z.row(2)<< 0,0,1,0;
29  Rot_z.row(3)<< 0,0,0,1;
30  Eigen::Matrix4d Rot_x;
31  Rot_x.row(0)<< -1,0,0,0;
32  Rot_x.row(1)<< 0,1,0,0;
33  Rot_x.row(2)<< 0,0,-1,0;
34  Rot_x.row(3)<< 0,0,0,1;
35 
36 
37  double radius = geometry.info[0];
38  double height = geometry.info[1];
39  double isLying = geometry.info[2];
40  double isFull = geometry.info[3];
41  ROS_DEBUG ("radius = %g", radius);
42  ROS_DEBUG ("height = %g", height);
43  ROS_DEBUG ("isLying = %g", isLying);
44  ROS_DEBUG ("isFull = %g", isFull);
45 
46 
47  Eigen::Vector3d projection(retta_hand_obj[0], retta_hand_obj[1],0);
48 
49  Eigen::Vector3d Liyng_projection(retta_hand_obj[0], 0, retta_hand_obj[2]);
50 
51  Eigen::Vector3d y_l = projection.normalized();
52  Eigen::Vector3d z_l = -z ;
53  Eigen::Vector3d x_l = y_l.cross(z_l);
54 
55  M_desired_local = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
56  M_desired_local.col(0) << x_l, 0;
57  M_desired_local.col(1) << y_l, 0; /*y_porojection*/
58  M_desired_local.col(2) << z_l, 0; /*z_cylinder*/
59 
60  /*takes the object on the top moved on the board*/
61  if((isLying == 0) && (isFull == 0))
62  {
63  Point_desired(0) = 0;
64  Point_desired(1) = 0;
65  Point_desired(2) = height * 0.5 + 0.05;
66  Point_desired(3) = 1;
67  ROS_DEBUG("cyl upright and empty");
68 
69  if (whichArm == 1) /*left arm*/
70  {
71  Point_desired(1) = - radius; /*along the y axis*/
72  M_desired_local.col(3) << Point_desired;
73  T_w_h = T_vito_c * M_desired_local* Rot_z;;
74  std::cout<<"Not Lying, Empty, left Arm, "<< std::endl;
75  }
76 
77  else
78  {
79  Point_desired(0) = - radius; /*along the x axis*/
80  M_desired_local.col(3) << Point_desired;
81 
82  T_w_h = T_vito_c * M_desired_local* Rot_z;
83  std::cout<<"Not Lying, Empty, right Arm, "<< std::endl;
84  }
85 
86  }
87 
88  /*takes the object on the top if the object's radius is minus than treshold*/
89  else if(((isLying == 0) && (isFull != 0)) && (radius< max_radius))
90  {
91  Point_desired(0) = 0;
92  Point_desired(1) = 0;
93  Point_desired(2) = height *0.5 + 0.05;
94  Point_desired(3) = 1;
95  ROS_DEBUG("cyl upright and full");
96 
97  M_desired_local.col(3) << Point_desired;
98 
99  // if (whichArm == 1) //left arm
100  // {
101  // T_w_h = T_vito_c * M_desired_local* Rot_z;
102  // std::cout<<"Not Lying, full, left Arm"<< std::endl;
103  // }
104 
105  // else
106  // {
107  // T_w_h = T_vito_c * M_desired_local* Rot_z;
108  // std::cout<<"Not Lying, full, rigth Arm"<< std::endl;
109  // }
110  T_w_h = T_vito_c * M_desired_local* Rot_z;
111  std::cout<<"Not Lying, full"<< std::endl;
112 
113  }
114 
115  /*if cilynder is lying, the pose is calculates in vito frame and we take it on the middle*/
116  else if ((isLying != 0) && (radius < max_radius))
117  {
118  Point_desired(0) = T_vito_c(0,3);
119  Point_desired(1) = T_vito_c(1,3);
120  Point_desired(2) = T_vito_c(2,3)+ radius + 0.05;
121  Point_desired(3) = 1;
122 
123  ROS_DEBUG("cyl is lying");
124 
125  if(whichArm == 1) /*left to check*/
126  {
127  z_l = -z;
128  x_l << T_vito_c(0,2), T_vito_c(1,2), T_vito_c(2,2) ;
129  y_l = z_l.cross(x_l);
130 
131  T_w_h.col(0) << x_l,0;
132  T_w_h.col(1) << y_l,0;
133  T_w_h.col(2) << z_l,0;
134  T_w_h.col(3) << Point_desired;
135  std::cout<<"Lying, left Arm"<< std::endl;
136  }
137 
138  else /*right*/
139  {
140  z_l = -z;
141  x_l << T_vito_c(0,2), T_vito_c(1,2), T_vito_c(2,2) ;
142  y_l = z_l.cross(x_l);
143 
144  T_w_h.col(0) << x_l,0;
145  T_w_h.col(1) << y_l,0;
146  T_w_h.col(2) << z_l,0;
147  T_w_h.col(3) << Point_desired;
148 
149  T_w_h = T_w_h*Rot_z;
150  std::cout<<"Lying, right Arm"<< std::endl;
151  }
152  }
153 
154  else
155  {
156  ROS_DEBUG("case not covered");
157  }
158 
159  ROS_DEBUG("Set hand final position");
160  geometry_msgs::Pose local_sh_pose;
161  fromEigenToPose( T_w_h ,local_sh_pose);
162 
163  return local_sh_pose;
164 }

166 void HandPoseGenerator::fromEigenToPose(Eigen::Matrix4d &tranfs_matrix, geometry_msgs::Pose &Hand_pose)
167 {
168  Eigen::Matrix<double,3,3> Tmatrix;
169  Tmatrix = tranfs_matrix.block<3,3>(0,0) ;
170  Eigen::Quaterniond quat_eigen_hand(Tmatrix);
171 
172  Hand_pose.orientation.x = (quat_eigen_hand.normalized()).x();
173  Hand_pose.orientation.y = (quat_eigen_hand.normalized()).y();
174  Hand_pose.orientation.z = (quat_eigen_hand.normalized()).z();
175  Hand_pose.orientation.w = (quat_eigen_hand.normalized()).w();
176  Hand_pose.position.x = tranfs_matrix(0,3);
177  Hand_pose.position.y = tranfs_matrix(1,3);
178  Hand_pose.position.z = tranfs_matrix(2,3);
179 
180 }
181 
182 
183 Eigen::Matrix4d HandPoseGenerator::FromMsgtoEigen(geometry_msgs::Pose &object)
184 {
185 
186  Eigen::Quaterniond transf_quad(object.orientation.w, object.orientation.x, object.orientation.y, object.orientation.z);
187  transf_quad.normalize();
188  Eigen::Vector3d translation(object.position.x, object.position.y, object.position.z);
189  Eigen::Matrix3d rotation(transf_quad.toRotationMatrix());
190 
191  Eigen::Matrix4d Matrix_transf;
192 
193  Matrix_transf.row(0) << rotation.row(0), translation[0];
194  Matrix_transf.row(1) << rotation.row(1), translation[1];
195  Matrix_transf.row(2) << rotation.row(2), translation[2];
196  Matrix_transf.row(3) << 0,0,0,1;
197 
198  return Matrix_transf;
199 }
200 
201 
202 int HandPoseGenerator::whichArm( geometry_msgs::Pose object_pose, int cyl_nbr )
203 {
204  /*We use vito frame for chose which arm use, while we use cylinder frame for calculates the straight line between hand frame and objects frame.*/
205  int return_value;
206  tf::StampedTransform hand_left, hand_rigth, hand_r_object,hand_l_object;
207 
208  listener_info.waitForTransform(base_frame_.c_str(), left_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(1));
209  listener_info.lookupTransform(base_frame_.c_str(), left_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time(0), hand_left);
210 
211  listener_info.waitForTransform(base_frame_.c_str(), right_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(1));
212  listener_info.lookupTransform(base_frame_.c_str(), right_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time(0), hand_rigth);
213 
214  /*Get information about the distance between the cylinder and soft-hand*/
215  listener_info.waitForTransform("object_"+ std::to_string(cyl_nbr), right_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(1));
216  listener_info.lookupTransform("object_"+std::to_string(cyl_nbr), right_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time(0), hand_r_object);
217 
218  listener_info.waitForTransform("object_"+std::to_string(cyl_nbr), left_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(1));
219  listener_info.lookupTransform("object_"+std::to_string(cyl_nbr), left_hand_frame_.c_str(), ros::Time(0), hand_l_object);
220 
221  Eigen::Vector3d object_position(object_pose.position.x, object_pose.position.y, object_pose.position.z);
222  Eigen::Vector3d hand_left_position(hand_left.getOrigin().x(),hand_left.getOrigin().y(),hand_left.getOrigin().z());
223  Eigen::Vector3d hand_right_position(hand_rigth.getOrigin().x(),hand_rigth.getOrigin().y(),hand_rigth.getOrigin().z());
224 
225  /*distance from each arm to cylinder. it use for decide wich arm to use*/
226  double dist_to_left_hand = std::sqrt((object_position[0] - hand_left_position[0]) * (object_position[0] - hand_left_position[0]) +
227  (object_position[1] - hand_left_position[1]) * (object_position[1] - hand_left_position[1]) +
228  (object_position[2] - hand_left_position[2]) * (object_position[2] - hand_left_position[2]) );
229 
230  double dist_to_right_hand = std::sqrt((object_position[0] - hand_right_position[0]) * (object_position[0] - hand_right_position[0]) +
231  (object_position[1] - hand_right_position[1]) * (object_position[1] - hand_right_position[1]) +
232  (object_position[2] - hand_right_position[2]) * (object_position[2] - hand_right_position[2]) );
233 
234  /*the straight line is calculates in cilynder frame*/
235  if(dist_to_left_hand < dist_to_right_hand)
236  {
237  ROS_INFO("Vito uses a: left arm because of distance");
238  retta_hand_obj[0] = hand_l_object.getOrigin().x();
239  retta_hand_obj[1] = hand_l_object.getOrigin().y();
240  retta_hand_obj[2] = hand_l_object.getOrigin().z();
241 
242  return_value = 1;
243  }
244  else
245  {
246  ROS_INFO("Vito uses a: Right arm because of distance");
247  retta_hand_obj[0] = hand_r_object.getOrigin().x();
248  retta_hand_obj[1] = hand_r_object.getOrigin().y();
249  retta_hand_obj[2] = hand_r_object.getOrigin().z();
250 
251  return_value = 0;
252  }
253 
254  return return_value;
255 }

259 /*Function for clear the table when the only object is obstacle*/
260 geometry_msgs::Pose HandPoseGenerator::ObstacleReject( desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle Pose_rej_obs, int arm_)
261 {
262  Eigen::Matrix4d T_vito_c, T_w_ob;
263  Eigen::Matrix4d M_desired_local; /* in cyl frame*/
264  Eigen::Vector4d Point_desired;
265  geometry_msgs::Pose pose_obj_hand;
266  Eigen::Vector3d x(1,0,0);
267  Eigen::Vector3d y(0,1,0), z(0,0,1);
268 
269  /*sends msgs to close hand*/
270  trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectory msg_jointT_hand;
271  msg_jointT_hand.joint_names.resize(1);
272  msg_jointT_hand.points.resize(1);
273  msg_jointT_hand.points[0].positions.resize(1);
274  msg_jointT_hand.points[0].positions[0] = 1.0;
275  msg_jointT_hand.points[0].time_from_start = ros::Duration(1); // 1s;
276 
277  T_vito_c = FromMsgtoEigen( Pose_rej_obs.pose );
278 
279  /*to remove object we decide to put with the back of the hand in the middle of the obstacles */
280  Point_desired(0) = T_vito_c(0,3) + Pose_rej_obs.info[0] + 0.16;
281  Point_desired(1) = T_vito_c(1,3) ;
282  Point_desired(2) = T_vito_c(2,3) +0.05;
283  Point_desired(3) = 1;
284 
285  M_desired_local = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
286 
287  if(arm_ == 1) /*left*/
288  {
289  T_w_ob.col(0) << -z, 0;
290  T_w_ob.col(1) << y, 0;
291  T_w_ob.col(2) << y.cross(z) , 0;
292 
293  msg_jointT_hand.joint_names[0] = left_hand_synergy_joint.c_str();
294  hand_publisher_left.publish(msg_jointT_hand);
295  }
296 
297  else /*right*/
298  {
299  T_w_ob.col(0) << z, 0;
300  T_w_ob.col(1) << -y,0;
301  T_w_ob.col(2) << y.cross(z), 0;
302 
303  msg_jointT_hand.joint_names[0] = right_hand_synergy_joint.c_str();
304  hand_publisher_right.publish(msg_jointT_hand);
305  }
306 
307  T_w_ob.col(3) << Point_desired;
308 
309  fromEigenToPose (T_w_ob, pose_obj_hand);
310 
311  ROS_DEBUG("obstacle to move");
312 
313  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform;
314  tf::poseMsgToTF( pose_obj_hand, tfHandTrasform);
315  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str(),"ObstacleReject") );
316 
317  return pose_obj_hand;
318 }

320 void HandPoseGenerator::Overturn()
321 {
322  /* std::cout<<"overturn"<<std::endl;*/
323  Eigen::Matrix3d rot_left;
324  Eigen::Matrix3d rot_right;
325 
326  desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle DesiredHandPose_left;
327  desperate_housewife::handPoseSingle DesiredHandPose_right;
328  Eigen::Vector3d x(1,0,0);
329  Eigen::Vector3d y(0,1,0), z(0,0,1);
330 
331  // Eigen::Matrix4d Rot_z;
332  // Rot_z.row(0)<< -1,0,0,0;
333  // Rot_z.row(1)<< 0,-1,0,0;
334  // Rot_z.row(2)<< 0,0,1,0;
335  // Rot_z.row(3)<< 0,0,0,1;
336 
337  // Eigen::Matrix3d ROT_y;
338  // ROT_y.row(0)<< 0,0,1;
339  // ROT_y.row(1)<< 0,1,0;
340  // ROT_y.row(2)<< -1,0,0;
341  // ROT_y.row(3)<< 0,0,0,1;
342 
343  rot_left.col(0) << x;
344  rot_left.col(1) << -z;
345  rot_left.col(2) << y;
346 
347 
348  rot_right.col(0) << -x;
349  rot_right.col(1) << y.cross(x);
350  rot_right.col(2) << -y;
351 
352 
353  Eigen::Quaterniond quat_eigen_harm_left(rot_left);
354  DesiredHandPose_left.pose.orientation.x = quat_eigen_harm_left.x();
355  DesiredHandPose_left.pose.orientation.y = quat_eigen_harm_left.y();
356  DesiredHandPose_left.pose.orientation.z = quat_eigen_harm_left.z();
357  DesiredHandPose_left.pose.orientation.w = quat_eigen_harm_left.w();
358 
359  Eigen::Quaterniond quat_eigen_harm_right(rot_right);
360  DesiredHandPose_right.pose.orientation.x = (quat_eigen_harm_right.normalized()).x();
361  DesiredHandPose_right.pose.orientation.y = (quat_eigen_harm_right.normalized()).y();
362  DesiredHandPose_right.pose.orientation.z = (quat_eigen_harm_right.normalized()).z();
363  DesiredHandPose_right.pose.orientation.w = (quat_eigen_harm_right.normalized()).w();
364 
365 
366  DesiredHandPose_left.pose.position.x = -1.0;
367  DesiredHandPose_left.pose.position.y = -0.5;
368  DesiredHandPose_left.pose.position.z = 0.15;
369 
370  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform;
371  tf::poseMsgToTF( DesiredHandPose_left.pose, tfHandTrasform);
372  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str(),"left ribalto") );
373 
374  DesiredHandPose_right.pose.position.x = -1.0;
375  DesiredHandPose_right.pose.position.y = 0.5;
376  DesiredHandPose_right.pose.position.z = 0.15;
377 
378  tf::Transform tfHandTrasform2;
379  tf::poseMsgToTF( DesiredHandPose_right.pose, tfHandTrasform2);
380  tf_desired_hand_pose.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfHandTrasform2, ros::Time::now(), base_frame_.c_str()," right ribalto") );
381  ROS_INFO("BUTTO TUTTO");
382 
383  //send
384  // desired_hand_publisher_left.publish(DesiredHandPose_left);
385  // Obj_info.data = 2; //flag to grasp object in the desperate_mind code
386  // objects_info_left_pub.publish(Obj_info);
387  // stop = 1; // flag to stop this procedur
388  // desired_hand_publisher_right.publish(DesiredHandPose_right);
389  // Obj_info.data = 2;
390  // objects_info_right_pub.publish(Obj_info);
391 }
